text: He imana vali'o! Bahuta sare adazi'am tom baco ki'unki kujha adaze papa hude hana ate (ika duje di) toha vica na lage riha karom. Ate tuhade vizom ko'i kise di pitha piche zugali na kare. Ki tuhade vizom ko'i isa gala nu pasada karega ki uha apane mare ho'e bhara da masa khave, isa nu tusim khuda mara samajhade ho. Ate alaha tom darom besaka alaha mu'afa karana vala rahimata karana vala hai
